item.title: ICE is reopening shuttered prisons as detention centers. Many have a troubled past
item.description: In its push for more immigrant detention space, the Trump administration is reopening shuttered prisons in several states. Many of these facilities, closed amid allegations of abuse and mismanagement.

item.title: Mourners grieve 10-year-old slain in Bondi mass shooting as Australia's leader pledges new hate laws
item.description: Hundreds of mourners bearing bright bouquets and clutching each other in grief gathered at a funeral in Sydney on Thursday for a 10-year-old girl who was gunned down in an antisemitic massacre during a Hanukkah celebration at Bondi Beach.

item.title: US announces massive package of arms sales to Taiwan valued at more than $10 billion
